head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MACMANNIS, BERTRAM R.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MACMANNIS, BERTRAM R.

block.p: MaCMANNIS-Bertram R. of Darien, CT on Tuesday, June 20. Husband of Sally Blake MacMannis. Father of Bertram R. MacMannis, Jr., Marcia MacMannis Fallon, Barbara MacMannis Kyle and James Andrew MacMannis. Grandfather of 9. Brother of Donald R. MacMannis. A Memorial Service will be held Saturday, June 24 at 10:30 AM at the Noroton Presbyterian Church, 2011 Post Road, Darien, CT. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to the Dartmouth Scholarship Fund, Class of 1939, Office of Stewardship, Fleet Bank Bldg., 63 South Main Street, Hanover, New Hampshire 03755, Attn: Melanie Norton or the Stamford Hospital, Critical Care Unit, Shelburne Road, Stamford, CT. 06902.
